systemSettings.title: System settings
systemSettings.description: Configure the system logo, name, and plan for upcoming license management.
systemSettings.branding.title: Branding
systemSettings.branding.description: Upload the logo and update the global name that appears across the workspace.
systemSettings.branding.logoHelp: Use a square PNG or SVG, 512×512 recommended.
systemSettings.branding.browserIconDescr: Shown in the browser tab. Supports PNG, SVG, or ICO.
systemSettings.branding.browserIconHelp: Recommended size 64×64+. ICO files will keep multiple sizes.
systemSettings.license.title: License management
systemSettings.license.description: Track license information and prepare for future enforcement workflows.
systemSettings.license.placeholder: No license has been uploaded yet. Add one when you're ready to enforce limits.
systemSettings.license.placeholders.note: Add any license restrictions, contact info, or renewal reminders.
systemSettings.license.notesHelp: These notes are visible only to administrators.
systemSettings.license.file.title: License file
systemSettings.license.file.description: Upload a signed PDF or ZIP archive containing the license details.
systemSettings.license.file.allowed: Accepted formats: PDF, ZIP. Max size 5MB.
